tasks.name: Planning & Preparation
subtasks: Define scope: URLs/Domains to audit; discovery and interviews
Baseline environment setup, any special access required

tasks.name: Initial Site Scans â€“ Tracking System
subtasks: Capture all tracking artifacts (cookies, storage, third party scripts, beacons/pixels)

tasks.name: Consent Mechanism Testing
subtasks: Opt out of all cookies, verify deactivation across user journeys
Audit site/app data flow compliance and messaging for GPC/DNSS signals

tasks.name: Analysis and Documentation
subtasks: Analyze risks and compliance gaps, especially with CCPA and other applicable regulations

tasks.name: Final Report and Recommendations
subtasks: Compile, present, and deliver findings with prioritized remediation items by risk and impact.
